commentBody: This episode gave way too much air to the dissenting opinion while barely recognizing the weighty opinions of the three legal scholars called by Democrats. A large chunk of the Turley audio was taken up by a quote about everybody being angry, which, while memorable, was less a scholarly legal opinion than a political editorial. The whole point of this hearing was to get the opinions of the scholars and "The Latest" gave us fluff that primarily benefitted one side of the argument.
